item.title: Sorting Series (4): Merge Sort - Stable Divide and Conquer and External Sorting
item.description: Systematic explanation of merge sort principles, stability, space trade-offs, and engineering scenarios with Python/C/C++/Go/Rust/JS implementations and external sorting guidance.
